title: Fragment, 1650–1700
medium:
Medium: Linen
Technique:
-Narrow loom-woven tape bent and folded to define pattern
-Buttonhole stitch over a cord for raised linear details
-Buttonhole stitch over a cord for connecting bars
-Needle-made fillings
-Padded, shaped and tapered forms in high
